name: L.A. Escape
description:
This is L.A. A land taken by the left-overs of society.

You play as Snake Plisken on a mission to rescue the president's daughter from the evil hands of Cuervo Jones. Help Snake complete his mission and regain his freedom.

The game spans two levels with different gameplay styles. It is strongly advised that you play with a joystick for a better experience.

Enjoy and leave your comments below!

  • Azagaya
